Edit and Add Annotations¶

XRi provides functions to edit the 360 videos and add kinds of annotations on the video.

Add annotation¶

Click Select Active Canvas button to enable select canvas mode, click any canvas, and click Select Active Canvas again to disable select canvas mode.

Click any button in first row to add an annotation in the selected canvas.

Edit annotation¶

Even though 360 video is projected on a sphere, annotations in the canvas are in Cartesian coordinate system.

So when you want to move any annotation, click on that annotation, press following keys to move.

-w -a -s -d -q -e
